Admissions FAQs



































UNIQUE. COMMITTED. REAL.
Say YES to UCR!







































 

























 
Congrats! You Did It
Congratulations on being admitted to the University of California, Riverside (UCR)! We welcome your bold heart and brilliant mind. Ranked in the top 15 for best public universities in the nation, UCR has created a new model for what a great public research university can help you achieve!
Let’s celebrate and share this moment with the world. Then we’ll show you how to say “YES” to UCR, take your next steps to enrollment, and join our welcoming and diverse community of Highlanders who are propelling ideas forward and transforming lives across the country and around the world.
Say “YES” to UCR Today!

 



















 











Welcome, Future Highlander!









































 



















 





Register for Highlander Day
April 15 for First Years | May 6 for Transfers
Get to know the people of UCR, those who will support and empower you, including faculty, staff, and students. Then tour campus hot spots, explore success resources, and find out why students just like you said “YES” to UCR!
 Register Now! ›
 













 










Connect With UCR Students


 Instagram
Follow @LifeatUCR to get to know other Highlanders and explore student life! Share a post and use #IAMUCR to celebrate your admission. You could be selected as a feature in this gallery!
